H0.text: How many medals did the United States win at the 2010 Winter Olympics. 25

H1.text: How many medals did the United States win at the 2010 Winter Olympics. 30

H2.text: How many medals did the United States win at the 2010 Winter Olympics. 42

H3.text: How many medals did the United States win at the 2010 Winter Olympics. 37

A4.text: The United States placed first in total medals—its second time doing so in a Winter Games—and set a new record for most medals won by a NOC at a single Winter Olympics, with 37

A5.text: The U.S. team had a historic Winter Games, winning an unprecedented 37 medals.

A6.text: The United States finished the 2010 Olympic Games by setting a new record for the most medals won by a single country at a Winter Olympics.
